# The lack of output indicates that the inspection of the inventory for the stone furnace did not yield any results or confirmations.
# This suggests that I may not have a stone furnace available in my inventory.

# Therefore, I will need to craft a stone furnace using the available resources. 
# Typically, crafting a stone furnace requires 3 stone and 1 iron plate.

# First, I will check if I have enough resources to craft a stone furnace.
current_inventory = inspect_inventory()  # Re-inspecting the inventory to confirm available resources.
print(current_inventory)  # Displaying the current inventory for reference.
